pages.title: Ender Dropper
pages.text: The Ender Dropper is the counterpart to the [Ender Hopper](book://magical_blocks/ender_hopper). With every [#](449900)redstone pulse[#]() it ejects an item from your personal [#](bb00bb)Ender Chest[#]().\\Beware: Who's stopping anyone from placing a button next to it and emptying your [#](bb00bb)Ender Chest[#]()?

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Ender Dropper only works while you are online.
